ExtensionPackage.name: ConcurrencyExtension
ExtensionPackage.description: Concurrency Tools, based on the code provided by 'antondorf' on the ThingWorx Developers Community.

ThingShape.name: wupMutexTS
ThingShape.description: Provides mutex blocking capabilities to the thing that implements this ThingShape, the mutex it's based on java ReentrantLock class with a fair policy activated.

ThingShape.name: wupCounterTS
ThingShape.description: Provides a 'autoincrement' counter with concurrency support in order to ensure atomic increases.

ScriptFunctionLibrary.name: ConcurrencyExtension
ScriptFunctionLibrary.description: Some tools for concurrenty, also to recover Concurrency stats as we can't create a subsystem from one extension

FunctionDefinition.name: GetTotalActiveWaiting_wupMutexTS
FunctionDefinition.description: Returns tht total active threads which are waiting on a lock.

FunctionDefinition.name: GetTotalThingsLocksUsage_wupMutexTS
FunctionDefinition.description: Returns the total number of mutex created on Things.
